event.title: Yearly Netherlands Fellowshipmeeting in Eindhoven, the Netherlands
event.body: This year, the Netherlands Fellowshipmeeting will be at T-DOSE. T-DOSE is a free and yearly event held in The Netherlands to promote use and development of Open Source Software. This year's event will be held on 28 and 29 November 2015 at the Fontys University of Applied Science, Rachelsmolen 1, in Eindhoven. FSFE Netherlands will be there with a booth on both days. The yearly Fellowshipmeeting will start on 28 November at 16:00h. This invitation is for everyone interested in the FSFE or Free Software. We're looking forward to meeting you there!
